name: The Trial (itch) (Gyro66)
description:
When the land has been conquered, Your clan must choose the one who will stay behind and lead. So they send you to a trial, to determine if you will be it.

Find your way trough puzzles and obstacles and learn to use your slaves at the right time. But beware, if you kill them all, you will have to finish alone.

Jump your way though levels.

Sacrifice your slaves to assist you .

Solves puzzles to advance.

This is an early prototype to test some ideas. You have access to the two tutorial levels. 

Nothing is definitive, it will have some bugs.

THIS BUILD IS TO TEST THE GENERAL IDEA AND THE GAMEPLAY

Inputs=

a= move left

d= move right

space= jump

c = crouch

e= interact
